programme.title: Bloomberg Wall Street Week
programme.desc: A weekly program telling the stories of capitalism from around the world, hosted by David Westin in New York.

programme.title: Bloomberg The Asia Trade
programme.desc: Live from Tokyo and Sydney with Shery Ahn and Haidi StroudWatts, getting insight and analysis from newsmakers and industry leaders on the biggest stories shaping markets.

programme.title: Bloomberg The China Show
programme.desc: Your definitive source for news and analysis on the worlds secondbiggest economy. Hosted by Yvonne Man and David Ingles.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings play kitesurf with a homemade kite. Grizzy notices that the shebear hes in love with watches the kite perform arabesques in the sky with admiration. He decides to make a kite that is far more sophisticated than the Lemmings kite.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are having a blast with a bowling game they found in the Rangers storeroom.

programme.title: Mr Bean The Animated Series
programme.desc: A local archaeology dig inspires Bean to go in search of treasure. But why buy a metal detector when you can make one from lawnmower parts and a dustbin lid?

programme.title: The Amazing World Of Gumball
programme.desc: When they find Anais training herself for a brutal showdown, Gumball and Darwin realise that their sister is being pestered at school by an annoying kid Billy. They try to teach her how to resolve the problem peacefully, but Billy has other ideas.

programme.title: Unikitty
programme.desc: When Unikitty and Hawkodile become stranded on a raft together, all Hawkodiles survival skills fall apart, while Unikittys fun approach works great!

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Like usual, Grizzy picks the door of the Rangers log cabin to come in and make himself comfortable, but this time its impossible to enter! The Lemmings have requisitioned the cabin for a party and barricaded themselves inside. Grizzy has no intention of waiting for an invitation to find a way to get in.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have placed giant remotecontrolled hydraulic jacks under the cabin to transform it into a lifesized rolling ball game. Grizzy, who in inclined to seasickness, tries to put things back in place. The cabin tips over into empty space.

programme.title: The Amazing World Of Gumball
programme.desc: Tobias sister, Rachel, is having a highschool party and Gumballs class is invited, providing they can bring along a date!

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: The team goes on a series of epic quests in order to create the worlds perfect sandwich.

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes
programme.desc: Daffy thinks the Sandman is a monster that throws sand in childrens eyes.

programme.title: Mini Beat Power Rockers
programme.desc: Due to a new software update, Myo gets reprogrammed and loses her musicality.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After being zapped by Penguins Songinator ray, the Batwheels find themselves only able to communicate through song! Theyll need to learn to harmonize as a team to defeat the musical prankster.

programme.title: Lucas The Spider
programme.desc: Dimples is worried about a tank decoration of a shark in her new aquarium But appearances can be deceptive.

programme.title: Mittens & Pants
programme.desc: Pants isnt as good at hideandseek as Mittens and Yogurt, the kittens. He gets advice on being calm from Kibble Corners best hideandseek champion, Mayor Sourdough.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Easter Bunny is sick, so she hires The Looney Builders to take over the festivities and ensure Looneyburg has a great Easter.

programme.title: Crippled Avengers
programme.desc: Chu Twin becomes crazy after his sons arms were chopped off. For no reason, he harms four people causing them various disabilities. The four disabled form a band to learn Kung Fu from a master, in order to take revenge on Chu Twin.

programme.title: The Twin Bracelets
programme.desc: Two teenage girls make a pledge to look after each other in a small Chinese fishing town, where the notions of womens rights or sexual freedom are absent. One ends up happily married to a stranger, while the other is cruelly betrothed to the abusive son of a wealthy family and has to seek to free herself from the situation.

programme.title: The New Shaolin Boxers
programme.desc: Young carriage driver Kin offends the gangsters by saving a young girl. His boss immediately fires him to avoid getting into trouble. Since then, Kin is determined to protect the weak and learns the Tsai Li Fu style of martial arts from a Shaolin master to challenge the gangsters, finally beating them.

programme.title: Singapore Tonight
programme.desc: From business to politics, health to technology, the latest news from Singapore and analysis of the impact.

programme.title: Money Mind
programme.desc: Money Mind is all about how to save, how to invest, and how to better spend your money. The show brings you weekly personal finance tips to help you make all the right money moves in Asia. Because, personal finance matters.

programme.title: Asia First
programme.desc: Live Top stories, business news and market updates from across the region as Asia gears up for the day ahead.

programme.title: The Peace And Love Process
programme.desc: Marie and Simon, a couple with two children, are deeply in love despite constant fights in their paired life. To save their marriage, they come up with a chart of Ten Rules to seek love and peace.

programme.title: Far Frontiers
programme.desc: Maria, wife of a deputy commander of a Russian military base in Kyrgyzstan, begins a relationship with another officer. Their affair quickly spirals out of control, fatally and irreversibly changing the course of Marias and her familys life.

programme.title: Deserted
programme.desc: While on assignment to the Sinai coast, Swedish photojournalist Ingrid is kidnapped by a group of Palestinian men and hidden in the desert. An unlikely love affair arises between Ingrid and one of her captors, Ali.

programme.title: DUNKIRK
programme.desc: In May 1940, German troops advanced across France, trapping Allied soldiers on Dunkirk. Civilians were recruited to bring the soldiers back to safety.

programme.title: BELOW
programme.desc: Strange happenings occur on a World War II submarine after the crew rescues a trio of survivors drifting in the open ocean.

programme.title: The 77 Percent
programme.desc: This week, we explore why Afrodescendants from the Americas and beyond, are choosing to leave their lives in the West to return to their ancestral Africa. We meet a single mother who traded life in Canada for a fresh start in Kenya and a filmmaker who returned to her roots in Sierra Leone. In Ghana, we hear from some of the over 1,000 African Americans now calling it home.

programme.desc: Does the team flip an outdated ranch that needs a headtotoe makeover, or a house that needs a complete layout overhaul? They decide to call on legendary Grant Cardone for help.

programme.title: HitandMiss Tour S1
programme.desc: Five celebrity friends go on a trip together but at each stop where it costs money, they will have to play games against each other to be exempt from paying. One final loser will cover the costs for all.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia S15
programme.desc: Taking inspiration from their surroundings the Temple of Boom, an evocative reimagining of the ancient Greek Acropolis the final eight split into two teams to add a contemporary twist to Greek food.

programme.title: Hider In My House
programme.desc: A young author buys the apartment of her dreams, but strange sounds begin to alarm her, along with a feeling of being watched. As she learns the history of the apartment, she uncovers a horrifying secret.

programme.title: Animal Senses 1
programme.desc: Some animals have senses that humans cant even conceive. With those powers they can do marvelous things.

programme.title: Planet Weird 1
programme.desc: Discover how weirdness is baked into some animals DNA from birth. Check out the bowerbirds funky mateattracting dance moves, the Christmas Island crabs trafficdodging prowess, and the sockeye salmons incredible uphill swimming skills.

programme.title: Planet Weird 1
programme.desc: Look at the supercharged abilities that give some animals an edge in life. Discover fireflies flirty flashes, the tarsiers incredible night vision, the mantis shrimps knockout punch, and the saltwater crocs preydetecting pressure sensors.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1
programme.desc: Set sail for New Zealands Otago Peninsula, a breeding refuge for endangered seabirds and marine mammals. Watch as sea lions, albatrosses, redbilled gulls, whitefronted terns, and fairy prions find mates, then nurture the next generation.

programme.title: Vox Luminis, Lionel Meunier Jommelli, Mozart Misteria Paschalia
Berliner Philharmoniker, FranoisXavier Roth Stravinsky, Bach
Ultimate 90s Playlist!
programme.desc: Nothing but the best tracks and ultimate anthems from the 90s.

programme.title: 90s Mixtape!
programme.desc: Get your walkman ready, weve handpicked a mega selection of 90s pop, R&B and dance videos from the MTV archive. Mix it up, on MTV 90s!

programme.title: MTV Rewind 2014
programme.desc: Step into the MTV Time Machine and travel back to 2014 to check out what tracks were stealing our hearts and ruling the charts!

programme.title: Rap & R&B Collabs!
programme.desc: Music has a great way of bringing people and genres together to form pure art! Here are some of our essential collaborations in Rap & R&B which just make sense!

programme.title: MTV Live Vault!
programme.desc: Weve headed down to the MTV Live Vault and discovered some amazing stuff. Its so good, we had to share it with you. This is the MTV Live Vault!

programme.title: Rock.Alt.Indie
programme.desc: Plug in your guitar and amp up the volume because were bringing you the best of the best from the Rock, Alternative and Indie scene!

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: RAMEN JAPAN
programme.desc: A gourmet tour of ramen all around Japan. This time the birthplace of tonkotsu, Fukuoka. Looking at the Hakata and Nagahama styles, well learn these ramens secrets, and the story of its creation.

programme.title: Core Kyoto mini
programme.desc: The Makie lacquering technique uses gold dust on a jetblack background to dazzling effect.

programme.title: Easy Japanese for Work
programme.desc: Ngocsan, from Vietnam, wants to help a new coworker sitting next to him and become a great senior, Senpai. To know and understand the proper way, Ngocsan will tackle a roleplay.

programme.title: Zero Waste Life
programme.desc: With a falling birthrate, school closures are on the rise in Japan, and things like desks and chairs have no place to go. Doi Kenji upcycles these discards into stylish and unique interior items.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Somewhere Street
programme.desc: Facing the Mediterranean Sea, Menton, a city in France, is famous for its mild subtropical climate and celebrated for its delicious lemons. The townscape also still retains its 13th century charm.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Chatroom Japan
programme.desc: German urbanist Chris Dimmer focuses on the communitybuilding potential of Japans public bathhouses, or Sento. He hopes that people living alone can rediscover the value of these bathhouses.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Based in South Korea and Japan, Kim Insook highlights diverse individuals through photography and video. She interacts with her subjects while looking beyond the labels society has given them.

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: We meet two foreigners in Tokyo. Former amateur champion dancer Daga Rutkowska from Poland trains with a paraathlete for a blind dance competition, and Chinese Zhang Ye works for a literary agency.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington
programme.desc: Taylor reveals its his birthday, but how can his friends make it special when they had no idea? Its Burns Night and Mrs Bird teaches Paddington about a rare creature called a Wild Haggis, but will it visit them?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: The Great Egg Hunt has just begun, and Blaze and Crusher are racing all over town to see who can find the most eggs. Only the first truck to collect 100 eggs will win the eggceptionally tasty chocolate trophy!

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Francois & Capn Turbot become stranded on a remote island,Ryder and the pups fly in to find and rescue the cousins. Its a double daring mid air rescue as Mayor Goodways first flying lesson goes sideways,the Pups make sure everyone lands safely.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Buddy Mayor Goodways gesture of goodwill gift grows wildly out of control when its planted in the wrong place. Time for a transplant! Metal mayhem ensues when Marshalls Fire Truck becomes mysteriously magnetized.

programme.title: Baby Sharks Big Show!
programme.desc: The Sharks travel to a tropical resort where Baby makes a plan to have the perfect vacation. Grandpa loses the TV remote and searches high and low to find it.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Barbapapa and Barbamama have announced to their dear barbababies that they are going on a trip to Easter Island. The Barbababies, the twins, and Mr. Strict set sail on Thse, a magnificent sailboat.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington
programme.desc: Itd Earth Day and Paddington has the important job of planting a tree, but will he find the perfect spot before it is too late? Baaz holds a Spring Harvest Festival, and everyone enjoys bringing their own celebration along.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: The power is out in Builder Cove! When the pups find out a beaver is to blame, theyve got to build him a new home to bring the power back. When Speed Meister damages the road ahead of the town helper parade, the pups work fast to repave the way.

programme.title: DORA
programme.desc: Dora, Boots, and Benny have to trek through the rainforest to deliver a big, delicate tres leches cake to Bennys abuela. Dora and the Fiesta Trio investigate a loud, strange noise that caused them to lose their instruments.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Squidward joins a crew of sailors hunting down the great white jellyfish. Plankton finds a magic bean that takes him to a land of giants well, more giant than usual.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: After falling down the drain, Plankton finds an unlikely ally in the sewers.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: After Patrick eats lifethreatening chum, SpongeBob helps him check off his bucket list. Patrick devolves back into a baby so he can keep his childhood toys.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne and Sid try their best to look for an after school activity to do together.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Used to being top dog, Carl cant handle when Adelaide joins his karate class and becomes the star student. Hector starts selling Rosas delicious tacos but gets overwhelmed when theyre more popular than the mercado!

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Now the oldest in the house, Leni struggles to follow in Loris footsteps as the familys babysitter. Secret agents Lincoln and Clyde investigate the Louds suspicious new neighbors.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: When Lola learns that Lana is planning their joint birthday, she does everything to stop it. Lincoln and the Middle School Action News Team solve the mystery of the missing popcorn.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Emboldened by her own talents, Storm enlists Lily and Blossom to help her chase Gargamel out of the forest forever... but unknowingly leads them into a trap! Hefty is challenged by Storm, but accidentally switches bodies with Baby Smurf.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Rowena casts a spell on Voltaire forcing him to obey and depriving Lily of her dragon friend. Smurfs are fed up with Jokeys pranks and decide to play him at his own game.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When Snow Yellow is deemed the Squarest of them all, the evil Queen Karen seeks to claim the title for herself by any means necessary.

programme.title: CE QUI A T ET CE QUI RESTERA...
programme.desc: For the last fifteen years, Thomas Fisch has travelled the Sahel and northern Niger in search of the Wodaabe Fula. Renowned for their cattle herds, the migrations of this nomadic people depend on the vagaries of weather and politics. Today some prefer to settle, whilst others maintain their traditional values.

programme.title: LE DESSOUS DES CARTES
programme.desc: Italy is divided between the favoured North and more precarious South. Its ageing population and the migration problems it is facing add to a unique political history. We look back at events and the phenomenon of Georgia Meloni, who is reviving a form of Italian neonationalism.

programme.title: AU NOM DE NOS ANCTRES, ESCLAVES ET NGOCIANTS
programme.desc: Aurlie Bambuck and Axelle Balguerie share the same history their ancestors participated in the transatlantic slave trade. One is the descendent of slaves while the other is the heiress of traders. The two women face up to their past and lay the foundations of an appeased memory. Encounter.
